originalText.text: I placed an order last May and they did not have the item, but they charged me anyway and told me to use a credit to get something else.  They did not offer me a refund, and there was really nothing I really wanted, but I did order replacement items and they didn't fit at all so had to return them.  They charged me a processing fee to return the items I ordered.  Now, 3 months later they ship me the original item I had ordered (which they had told me they would never have again) without my knowledge and charged my credit card.  When I called, they said I would have to pay a processing fee again to return it.  The item was shipped out on 8/14/23 and I received an email on 8/15/23 saying order was on the way and the item arrived on Friday 8/18/23.  By the time I saw the email I had to wait until the 16th to call and tell them not to send it out, but it was already on the way.  The item should never have been sent to me without my consent, and my credit card should NEVER have been charged again.  DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY EVER!!!  The quality is poor, the sizes are off and the customer service is horrible.  I think it is stealing to send something out that I was told they would never have again.  They should have contacted me well before it was shipped and I should have been given the option to not get the item.  This is really a minus star review.

originalText.text: Have been a client since 2009.  Received a late fee on my account even though I paid on time.  Company refused to remove late fee, and then charged me interest on the late fee.  I closed my account do to poor management.  Company has bad billing personal, and corporate does not take phone calls.

I closed my account do to poor management.  Company has bad billing personal, and corporate does not take phone calls.

originalText.text: They took money from my Pay Pal account two months in a row for a rewards program I supposedly signed up for.  They are refusing to refund the money but instead sent me an e-mail letting me know who manages their rewards program.  I have zero respect for companies that take advantage of their customers like this.  I never sign up for rewards programs, and I'm not even sure how it happened through the ordering process.  I will never order from them again. Buyer beware!!

originalText.text: Ordered on May 20th expedited shipping.  Was to arrive the 25th of May.  Tracking order via UPS label created package not received.  Billed and notified that package was shipped.  No movement on UPS, package still not received.  Engagement with CS is fruitless. Tried to get the same items shipped on their dime two day delivery.  Was told that can't be done or ensure that  it would make two days. They can't call their Distribution center to find out the issue with the order.  Instead they have my money and I have to wait until the 10th of June to get a potential refund. They have a policy which they will not amend, I asked for my refund now. Meanwhile I am out a dress for a special even this Friday, they have my money and they did refund my expedited shipping.   Sad I have been buying from FullBeauty Brands, of which Roamans is one of them, for years and now these responses.  Even supervisor was not helpful.  Please don't buy from any of their brands, this is not acceptable and their policy is keep your money while you get nothing.  Trust me I am tracking down someone in corporate who will also hear my story.

originalText.text: I believe that I am being generous with my review.  I have enjoyed most of the clothing that I've purchased.  The problem is their horrible website and delivery!  DO NOT order anything that you are needing for a special event that is coming up within the next month (or two)!  Their site shows whether an article is in-stock, but twice I've ordered items "in-stock" only to find out over a week later that they are on back order.  I'm not sure what takes them so long to prepare an order, but they rarely ship it the same week.  And their tracking service is horrible.  Supposedly they will not charge your account until the item has shipped, but then when it can't be tracked and is listed as "Exceptional" (what does that even mean?!) the money is still out of my account and I have no idea where my order is.  It is not worth the hassle.
